resources.string: Are you the true fan you say you are? Test your skills right here!
1. Which two actors directed themselves in movies and won Oscars for Best Actor?
2. Who is the most nominated actor in Academy history?
3. Actor Ryan Reynolds appears as Wade Wilson in the 2009 movie X-Men Origins: Wolverine.
4. Jim Carey was considered for the role of Captain Jack Sparrow in Pirates of the Caribbean.
5. What is the name of the best known city in all the Batman movies?
6. Which of the following movies have been made by Martin Scorsese ? (pick 2 answers)
None right. I can\'t even with you now! I\'m speechless!
SHAME! You only got %1$d correct. Try again why don\'t you!
Not too bad, you got %1$d correct answers. I know you can do better.
Great job! You got %1$d correct answers. I declare you movie royalty!
